reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 298/10: EXEMPTION RE SECTION 31 OF THE ACT
reg_info.reg_name_text: EXEMPTION RE SECTION 31 OF THE ACT
reg_info.act_under: Waste Diversion Act, 2002   Loi de 2002 sur le réacheminement des déchets

content.content: 1. (1) Subsection 31 (1) of the Act does not apply to a person who is designated under the rules made under section 30 of the Act as a steward in respect of municipal hazardous or special waste, as defined in Ontario Regulation 542/06 (Municipal Hazard or Special Waste) made under the Act. O. Reg. 298/10, s. 1 (1). (2) Subsection (1) does not apply in respect of a waste subject to the Municipal Hazardous or Special Waste Program Plan. O. Reg. 298/10, s. 1 (2). (3) In this section, “Municipal Hazardous or Special Waste Program Plan” means the waste diversion program set out in the document entitled “Municipal Hazardous or Special Waste (MHSW) Program Plan”, dated May 23, 2007 and updated November 26, 2007, and approved by the Minister on February 19, 2008. O. Reg. 298/10, s. 1 (3).
content.raw_html:
1. (1) Subsection 31 (1) of the Act does not apply to a person who is designated under the rules made under section 30 of the Act as a steward in respect of municipal hazardous or special waste, as defined in Ontario Regulation 542/06 (Municipal Hazard or Special Waste) made under the Act. O. Reg. 298/10, s. 1 (1).

(2) Subsection (1) does not apply in respect of a waste subject to the Municipal Hazardous or Special Waste Program Plan. O. Reg. 298/10, s. 1 (2).

(3) In this section,

“Municipal Hazardous or Special Waste Program Plan” means the waste diversion program set out in the document entitled “Municipal Hazardous or Special Waste (MHSW) Program Plan”, dated May 23, 2007 and updated November 26, 2007, and approved by the Minister on February 19, 2008. O. Reg. 298/10, s. 1 (3).

content.content: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 298/10, s. 3.
content.raw_html: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 298/10, s. 3.
